synopsis.text:
Gear up for a thrilling adventure in a world transformed by the discovery of Gaimetal, a powerful energy-rich metal ore buried 50,000 meters beneath the Earth's surface in 2047. As global mining operations commence, a new threat arises in the form of Gaist, enigmatic metallic lifeforms encrusted with Gaimetal. Emerging in 2055, these creatures begin to wreak havoc on humanity.

Fast forward to 2064, and the Gaist Crusher Garrison (GCG) is established, an organization dedicated to combating the Gaist menace. Among its ranks are Rekka, Hayato, Kurama, and Siren, brave warriors donning specialized Gaist Gear, armor harnessing the power of Gaimetal. With over 100 Gaist creature varieties to confront, these heroes stand as humanity's last line of defense against the relentless onslaught. Prepare to join them in their epic battles and uncover the secrets behind the mysterious Gaist and the shadowy organization known as the Erasers.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
